info.name: Customer Service API Documentation
info.description: Listing and documentation of the Customer Service API endpoints.

request.description:
Creates a client - an account for a KennUWare customer to use on the CS Silo.

For internal silo use only.

[Post Client Schema](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1O3ynQbHdWkIH7_ozWY0hIiIemv6-vLbN)

[Returned Client Schema](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1Ej-NvwS1_Q8zSKOita51xZGNd5BDDv-3)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Location
header.description: Used in redirection, or when a new resource has been created.

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: X-Powered-By
header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

request.description:
Returns a list of all clients in the CS Client database.

For internal silo use only.

[Returned Client List Schema](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1zn66MRnC836c463jhi3mEVEg7xKzT50V)

item.name: Filter by Agent, Client, and Product

request.description:
Returns the list of all tickets in the CS Ticket table. 
Optionally allows tickets to be filtered by the Serial Number of the product they were created for and/or by the id of the Client who created them.

Used internally by CS silo to get the tickets associated with a client.

Used externally by Manufacturing silo to get the ticket associated with a returned device.

[Returned Ticket List Schema](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1MaMXQAg8raU50XSXN4VMXENUwXTwko8d)

item.name: Comments
item.description: Listing and documentation for Customer Service API endpoints

query.description: (Required: Integer) ID of the ticket this comment will be on
(Required: Integer) ID of the agent this comment will be posted by
